def max_saved_points(n, k, x_coords, y_coords):
    x_coords.sort()
    l3 = []
    l4 = [0]
    i = 1
    j = 0
    ans = 0
    while i < n and j < n:
        if x_coords[j] - x_coords[i] <= k and j >= i:
            ans = max(ans, j - i + 1)
            l3.append(ans)
            j += 1
        else:
            i += 1
    i = n - 1
    j = n - 1
    ans = 0
    while i > 0 and j > 0:
        if x_coords[i] - x_coords[j] <= k and j <= i:
            ans = max(ans, i - j + 1)
            l4.append(ans)
            j -= 1
        else:
            i -= 1
    c = len(l3)
    ans = 0
    for i in range(c):
        ans = max(ans, l3[i] + l4[n - i - 1])
    return ans
